name: appknox-azure-extension
description: Appknox azure pipeline extension for auto security testing

scripts.tfxpublish: npm run compile && tfx extension publish --manifest vss-extension.json -t ${TFX_TOKEN}
scripts.compile: npm run tsbuild && npm run tfxcreate
scripts.release: npm run testtfxtoken && release-it --ci && npm run tfxpublish
scripts.testtfxtoken: if [[ -z ${TFX_TOKEN} ]]; then echo '$TFX_TOKEN not set' && exit 1 ;fi

author: Appknox
